TABLE.NAME: ltiservice_gradebookservices
TABLE.COMMENT: This file records the grade items created by the LTI Gradebook Services service

FIELD.NAME: toolproxyid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the Tool Proxy instance.

FIELD.NAME: resourcelinkid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the LTI element related with this lineitem.

FIELD.NAME: lineitemtoolproviderid
FIELD.COMMENT: Type specified for the line item

FIELD.NAME: previousid
FIELD.COMMENT: Needed for backup purposes. The id of this entry in before restoring it

KEY.NAME: resourcelink
KEY.COMMENT: The ID of the LTI element related with this lineitem.
